issue.title: the use of the parameter 'ProxyHost' is not working
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Despite the parameter 'Proxyhost' is defined in the EasySDI Map Options, layers are not added to the map.

Error : 
XMLHttpRequest cannot load http://sig.net/geoserver/wms?SERVICE=WMS&REQUEST=GetCapabilities. 
Origin http://sig.net is not allowed by Access-Control-Allow-Origin.

**Fixed versions :** 3.1.3

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

The script :
> geoext/lib/overrides/override-ext-ajax.js
must be include in the viewer page to make the proxy also work for AJAX requests that are not sent by OpenLayers.
